Text: Dear friend @jmanwf i just want again to say a big thanks for all your efforts and anti selfishness character to bring us our family favorite soap.Days of our lives is our best soap of all and if u did not upload the show we would not have the change to watch it...Here where i live they stoped play it about 10-15 years ago and it was very old episodes..And its only u mate.There was 2 people that used to upload but they stoped..So best soap friend i hope u will contiune to gives our soap for a long long time because,exept my family many others from my town watch it to.Cheers.
And btw i just love Sami is one of the most attractive prety girls out there..Very baby face but so troubled now this days..I hope Kate gives her a brake and stuff.!!:-(
